analysis.description: erc20 in EthTweetMe.sendEthTweet (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#190) is a local variable never initialiazed

EthTweetMe.sendEthTweet (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#178-254) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-erc20.transfer(influencer.influencerAddress,payouts[0]) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#226-227)
	-erc20.transfer(influencer.charityAddress,payouts[1]) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#233-234)
	-erc20.transfer(feePayoutAddress,payouts[2]) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#246-248)
	-erc20.transfer(webappAddress,payouts[3]) (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#253)
ERC20Basic.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/17/0x4fd4181d471f35797312b95119ae87642d7a46f1.sol#5-6) should be declared external
